name: You ARE Digestion
description:
Please click the How to Play button the first time you play. It's short and helpful, I promise.

Submission to Weekly Game Jam #31

In this game you ARE digestion. Manage the digestion of a savage human that swallows everything in its way! With access to the esophagus, stomach and intestines work your way to avoid your human from dying while earning as much cookies as you can.

Developed by jvolonte.

Main Theme Credits:

Title: 8-bit Funny Theme
Author: FiluAndDina
